name: BeOne - A Diversity & Inclusion Game
description:
Our efforts towards Diversity & Inclusion are never enough and never too much. Learn some new facts about excluded groups of our society, and build a diverse and equal world.

Your objective is to Integrate the most excluded persons into society, and seeking to do so ensuring equality and diversity. You will initially have 10 rounds to play – which can be increased by 2 rounds – each round representing one month of your ‘inclusion’ work. At the end of the game you will have scored a number of Diversity and Inclusion Points (or 'IP'), try to improve your score by playing again and testing different integration strategies.
